definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]

sentences.english: In the short run, though, probably the biggest help would be credible fiscal leadership.
sentences.chinese: 然而，短期來看，最大的奧援是可信的財經領導能力。

sentences.english: The book is in compliance with Liang Shuming's Main Points of Chinese Culture.
sentences.chinese: 此書與梁漱溟《中國文化要義》聲氣相求，互爲奧援。
